channel.title: I need help with the runserver.bat
channel.description:
when i click runserver.bat it said starting testscape server on 0.0.0.:43594 exception in thread "main" java.lang.nullpointerexception at npchandler.monsterdropitem(npchandler.java:402) at npchandler.monsterdropitems(npchandler.java:317) at npchandler.process(npchandler.java:241) at server.main(server.java:46)
please i need help i dont know how to fix also it dosent let me in my server

item.title: I need help with the runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Tvs1230 Tvs1230
item.description:
@Tvs1230 wrote:

im in the help section and i need help with my server so it should be fine

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with the runserver.bat

item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Tvs1230:

first please 93dcthugs93 dont comment me like that im a noobie at this and when i try to log into my server it trys to log me in like 1 mill times (so no it dosent let me log in)

Only telling you what not to do so I or another mod don’t lock your threads.
